page.title: 15SMEDLEY'S OF SPALDING (2)
page.content:
Changes in people's eating habits has led to a drift away from canned to frozen products.
The cost of metal for cans and cost of energy to process the foods has led to more food being frozen because it works out cheaper. Frozen foods have a lot better flavour which the housewife is well aware of and the people only have to use what they need so it saves on household expenses in the long run. In this age of looking for healthy food frozen food is much more nutrious than canned food. It is expected that people will be still eating canned and frozen products in 50 years time. Smedley's are looking more at Continental dishes these days in order to cater for a variety of tastes.
